metadata.dc:title: La revolucion industrial azucarera en Cuba, Brasil y Argentina. Tecnologia y cambio social (ca. 1870-1930).
[The industrial revolution of the sugar industry in Cuba, Brazil, and Argentina: technology and social change, ca. 1870-1930].
